com.acmetelecom

Class Bill

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acmetelecom.Bill

  • public class Bill
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about a customer's bill.

      • Bill

        public Bill(com.acmetelecom.customer.Customer customer,
    java.util.List<LineItem> items,
    java.lang.String totalBill)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        customer - The customer this bill is for.
        items - A list of LineItems which each identifies a call the customer has made and its cost.
        totalBill - The customer's total bill.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If any of arguments are null.
